env GO111MODULE=on

env GOTOOLCHAIN=go1.21
! go mod download rsc.io/quote@v1.5.1
stderr 'go: invalid GOTOOLCHAIN: go1.21 is a language version but not a toolchain version'

env GOTOOLCHAIN=go1.22
! go mod download rsc.io/quote@v1.5.1
stderr 'go: invalid GOTOOLCHAIN: go1.22 is a language version but not a toolchain version'
